name: Employment Contract
shortDescription: An Employment Contract is a legally enforceable contract that contains all the terms of employment, as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of the employee.
description: An Employment Contract is a legally enforceable contract that contains all the terms of employment, as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of the employee.

howWeWork.heading: How to get an Employment Contact drafted

content.title: Schedule Call with the Lawyer
content.description: Schedule Call and discuss with the Lawyer your Document drafting requirements

content.title: Get your Agreement Draft
content.description: Lawyer will deliver customized draft of the Document as per your requirement

content.title: Dedicated Lawyer Available
content.description: 60 Minutes of Talk time with the Lawyer for discussing requirements and changes in the draft

content.title: First Draft within 3 Days
content.description: First draft of the Document will be delivered within a maximum of 3 working days

content.title: Finalize Document
content.description: 2/3 Iterations per Document allowed to incorporate your suggestions/changes

content.title: Terms of the Employment
content.description: The contract prescribes details of the nature of employment, location, pay, probation period and leave policy.

content.title: Non Disclosure Obligation
content.description: Confidentiality clause gives protection to company’s sensitive information such as trade secrets and client data and obligates the employee to keep such information confidential from the public

content.title: Non Compete
content.description: This section of the agreement states that an employee during the term of the employment with the Company will not engage in any business activity which is competitive with the Company nor work for any company which competes with the Company.

content.title: Non Solicitation
content.description: This section of the agreement prohibits the employee from soliciting any employee or independent contractor of the Company on behalf of any other business during or after his period of employment.

content.title: Notice period
content.description: It defines the time period that one must serve from the date of submitting the resignation letter, till the date of being relieved from the company.

content.title: Jurisdiction
content.description: The agreement specifies in case of dispute which court will have jurisdiction. This clause helps the disclosing party avoid litigation cost.

benefits.heading: Benefits of drafting an Employment Contract

content.description: The contract can specifically depict the terms in which the employee can be terminated.
The contract provides the details of benefits and responsibilities clearly.
In case of dispute an employment contract provides for a dispute resolution mechanism.

productFeature.description: Senior Corporate Lawyers with 15+ years of experience

whyChooseUs.title: Reliable & Trusted
whyChooseUs.description: Over 3,000 five star reviews from our customers

whyChooseUs.title: Fast & Easy
whyChooseUs.description: Get legal contracts drafted from expert corporate lawyers. Agreement drafts are delivered within a maximum of 2 days

whyChooseUs.title: Secure & Confidential
whyChooseUs.description: Documents and information are always kept private. Information shared with the lawyer are 100% confidential.

faqs.question: What are the types of employment contracts?
faqs.answer: Permanent employment, temporary employment and independent contractors are the three types of employment contracts.

faqs.question: Is employment contract legally binding in India?
faqs.answer: Under the Indian Law, the employment agreement with negative covenants is valid and legally enforceable. If it fulfill the essentials of a valid contract.

faqs.question: I have an employment contract; how can I get it reviewed by a Lawyer?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your employment contract reviewed and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can upload your document and schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer.

faqs.question: What is the process of getting the Agreement drafted from ezyLegal?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal offers Standard and Customised Document drafts. If you chose the Customised Document option, your call will be scheduled with a Lawyer to whom you can explain your specific requirements. The first draft will be delivered within 2 working days and then you would be allowed 2-3 iterations to make changes in the draft.

faqs.question: How will the Document be delivered to me?
faqs.answer:
The Document when ready, will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. You will be notified on email and WhatsApp whenever a new version of the Document is uploaded. You can Log-in and View or Download the document. 

Copy of the documents delivered by ezyLegal will always be available in your ezyLegal account forever.
